text: Willy Juana Stähle (16 June 1954 - 27 August 2015) was a Dutch world water skiing champion. She won a gold for women's figure skiing and a silver medal for women's slalom at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, Germany. She was the Dutch Sportswoman of the Year in 1971. Stähle was born in Amsterdam. Her death was announced on 1 September 2015. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Netherlands Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Netherlands Category:Medalists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Amsterdam
title: Willy Stähle
